name: 蔡福裕
objective: 本課程旨在教導學生具備獨立思考有機化學的能力;因此課程分為基本觀念(結構式與鍵結),有機化學反應與反應機構以及化合物的製備與分析等三大部分。
schedule:
1. 授課大綱及考試評分規定
2. Acids and Bases: Central to Understanding Organic Chemistry
3-4. An Introduction to Organic Compounds: Nomenclature, Physical Properties, and Structure
5-6. Isomers: The Arrangement of Atom in Space 
7.第一次考試
8. Alkenes: Structure, Nomenclature, and an Introduction to Reactivity
9-10.The Reactions of Alkenes
11-12. The Reactions of Alkynes: An Introduction to Multistep Synthesis
13.第二次考試
14. Delocalized Electrons. 
15-16. Susbtitution and Elimination Reactions of Alkyl Halides
17. Reactions of Alcohols, Ethers, Epoxides, Amines, and Sulfur-Containing Compounds
18. 期末考
materials:
Organic Chemistry
Paula Yurkanis Bruice
8th Ed.
